definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: A spectrum is then obtained and telemetered to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 然后记录它的光谱，并将数据通过遥测系统发回地面。

sentences.english: This is its first processed color image since entering Mercury orbit.
sentences.chinese: 这是信使号进入水星轨道后发回的首张彩色照片。

sentences.english: The relation between the remand for new trial and the principle of no appeal resulting in additional punishment is seldom discussed before.
sentences.chinese: 发回重审和上诉不加刑原则的关系问题很少有人论及。
莫里斯从喀布尔发回报道称。

sentences.english: The three part introduces the opinions of improving the remanding re-trial in the criminal appeal trial.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分完善我国刑事二审发回重审制度的建议。

sentences.english: Lizzy Davies reports from Amsterdam's Schiphol airport Link to this audio
sentences.chinese: 丽姿从阿姆斯特丹斯希波尔机场发回的报道。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the stipulation of remanding for the problems of substantive disposition should be cancelled too.
sentences.chinese: 三是取消实体处理有问题可以发回重审这一规定。

sentences.english: Any law returned by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress shall immediately be invalidated.
sentences.chinese: 经全国人民代表大会常务委员会发回的法律立即失效。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is urgently needed to reform and perfect.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我国发回重审制度亟待改革与完善。

sentences.english: Our Africa editor Mary Harper reports on the documents presented in court.
sentences.chinese: 下面是本台记者发回的法庭文件报道。

sentences.english: Also, for the first time, the new rover will send video back to Earth.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的流动站也会在第一时间内把录像发回地球。

sentences.english: This information is sent as a setup message by the signaling gateway back to the MGC.
sentences.chinese: 这种消息作为建立的消息由信令网关发回给mgc。

sentences.english: The output result is then sent back to the invoker.
sentences.chinese: 于是输出结果就会发回给调用者。

sentences.english: ANasa probe has sent back photographs of what appear to be trees on theplanet's surface.
sentences.chinese: 美国宇航局探测器发回看似星球表面树木的照片。
斯蒂夫罗森伯格从柏林发回的报道。
